text: Atahpara ami tara kache adesa prerana karalama ye, tumi amara drstira samane ebam amara nirdese nauka tairi kara. Erapara yakhana amara adesa ase ebam culli plabita haya, takhana naukaya tule na'o, pratyeka jibera eka eka jora ebam tomara paribarabargake, tadera madhye yadera bipakse purbe sid'dhanta neya hayeche tadera chara. Ebam tumi jalemadera samparke amake kichu balo na. Niscaya tara nimajjata habe.
